news.content:
ðŸ“£ ThreeFold @ Consensus 2022


In one month from now, the ThreeFold team will be heading to Austin, TX for Consensus 2022 by CoinDesk, where ThreeFold will be a sponsor!


Consensus is the Festival for the Decentralized World â€“ and a decentralized world needs a decentralized Internet â€“ so we are super excited to share ThreeFold with this audience of 15,000+ people.


We'll have more to share, including details on a ThreeFold gathering. For now, if you're interested in heading to Austin, please take advantage of our discount code.
news.excerpt: ThreeFold will soon be heading to Austin, TX as a sponsor for Consensus 2022 by CoinDesk!
